Source.Name: portmidi
Source.Summary: PortMidi is a library for real-time input and output of MIDI data using a system-independent interface.
Source.Description: PortMidi is a library for software developers. It supports real-time input and output of MIDI data using a system-independent interface.

Package.Summary: PortMidi is a library for real-time input and output of MIDI data using a system-independent interface.
